author: dkhaywood
msg: Moving InteractionListener and events from testlib and into corelib.  Two reasons: first, can then make it a responsibility of InteractionContext to create the corresponding event; secondly (longer-term) - will provide capability to "record" interactions done by users, eg for writing regression/functional tests, or perhaps for capturing macros.
